name: Dodge The Creeps Reloaded
description:
Intro:

This game is simple: move your character to avoid the others!

Content suited to any age.

Controls:

Joystick: Left Joystick.

Keyboard: Move with WASD, ZQSD, or the Arrows.

Credits:

The game's code (characterized as the gdscript files) is released under an MIT license. The other assets have their own license here:


Godot Documentation tutorial (initially written by Chris Bradfield)https://docs.godotengine.org/en/latest/getting_started/step_by_step/your_first_g...Chris Bradfield's Websitehttp://kidscancode.orgGDQuest video tutorialhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WEt2JHEe-do

Note:

I made this game (in 1 day) just for the sake of finishing a project, the code quality is therefore quite poor (the performances are not really affected, but I wanted to point it out if you want to edit it) in my opinion but at least you can play it!
